text: Jab unke samne koi ayat aati hai to woh kehte hain “hum na manenge jab tak ke woh cheez khud humko na di jaye jo Allah ke Rasoolon ko di gayi hai”. Allah zyada behtar jaanta hai ke apni paighambari ka kaam kissey ley aur kis tarah ley. kareeb hai woh waqt jab yeh mujreem apni makkariyon ki padash mein Allah ke haan zillat aur sakht azaab se do-char honge
